name: kgt
description: Kitten Growth Tracker using MERN on AWS
author: Kathleen Minckler

scripts.install: cd back-end && npm install && cd ../front-end && npm install && cd ..
scripts.production: cd back-end && npm run start && cd ../front-end && npm run build && npx http-server ./dist
scripts.restart-server: cd back-end && npm run restart && cd ..
scripts.server-status: cd back-end && npm run status && cd ..
scripts.rebuild-client: cd front-end && npm run build && cd ..
